column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant | Participants # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=When I was a kid , my dad was a licensed pilot and he had a small plane .
#text=He lived in a small town about 2 hours by car north of the larger town when we kids lived with our mom .
#text=We would go visit my dad every other weekend .
#text=My grandfather was a pilot too and had a small plane .
#text=His was smaller , though , and only seated 2 people .
#text=It was fun to fly in because I got to sit in front and see out the front and watch him work the controls .
#text=When we flew with my dad , my stepmother sat in the front seat and all three of us kids sat in the back seat .
#text=We were small , so we all fit .
#text=There was n't much room for luggage , but my dad would load the luggage behind the back seat .
#text=Then he would do the preflight checks .
#text=Some of these were outside the plane , but most of them were done from the inside .
#text=He would radio the tower and ask for permission to take off .
#text=The takeoff was a little scary because in a plane that small you could really feel the wind and the forces of the take off .
#text=The flight itself was fairly boring because you could n't really see anything from the back .
#text=Sadly , I had bad motion sickness , and my main memory of the landings is throwing up down the back of my dad 's neck .
